creator: Commercial Bank of Dubai
descriptionHtml:
Hello revolutionary banking.

Imagine a banking app that is as smart as your phone. An app that uses smart functionalities to help you manage your money every day.

You know what?

This incredible app is here. It’s for you to download and use. Say goodbye to your other bank accounts and make the switch today, you won’t regret it. You’ll be in good company too, the app has already been voted the best banking app in the UAE.

APPLY RIGHT FROM YOUR SOFA

Give it a try, our simple and fast application is 100% mobile, instantly apply for a bank account, savings account and credit card in just a few minutes, from anywhere.
Open foreign currency and gold accounts instantly.

PAY INSTANTLY

· Easy transfers: it only takes a few seconds to send money anywhere and to anyone.
· Pay for your utility bills in seconds, set auto-pay to never miss a payment.
· Pay any Credit Card in the UAE.

SMART BANKING

· Know what is going on: get handy notifications in real-time.
· View all transactions and filter them by categories.
· Set monthly budget goals.

GET MORE

Rack up the rewards!
· 2 for 1? Let’s go! Get access to lifestyle offers with over 500 discounts available to redeem instantly right from the app.
· Earn wherever you spend: automatically earn CBD Rewards points with your spends.
· Convert your CBD Rewards points to cashback, air miles, vouchers, flights & hotels bookings and more!


DID YOU KNOW? You can also…

· Login with your fingerprint or FaceID (for iPhone X and 11)
· Apply for any CBD products including Islamic banking
· Lock / unlock your cards in real-time
· Update your profile details such as Emirates ID
· Get help with our virtual assistant Aysha
· Use UAE pass to recover your login details
· Top up existing loans, get salary advance (for eligible customers)

There’s a lot more to come! Expect to see more exciting and innovative new features often. Send us your suggestions and feedback at one.app@cbd.ae
descriptionShort: Get UAE’s best mobile banking app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Pay in a snap with Google Pay and Samsung Pay on all your CBD debit and credit cards! Simply use your phone to pay anywhere, it’s fast, safe and simple.
Head over to the cards screen and select the card to add, it’s that easy.

This update also includes general fixes and performance improvements.

This incredible app is here. It’s for you to download and use. Say goodbye to your other bank accounts and make the switch today, you won’t regret it. You’ll be in good company too, the app has already been voted the best banking app in the UAE.

APPLY RIGHT FROM YOUR SOFA

Give it a try, our simple and fast application is 100% mobile, instantly apply for a bank account, savings account and credit card in just a few minutes, from anywhere.
Open foreign currency and gold accounts instantly.

PAY INSTANTLY

· Easy transfers: it only takes a few seconds to send money anywhere and to anyone.
· Pay for your utility bills in seconds, set auto-pay to never miss a payment.
· Pay any Credit Card in the UAE.

SMART BANKING

· Know what is going on: get handy notifications in real-time.
· View all transactions and filter them by categories.
· Set monthly budget goals.

GET MORE

Rack up the rewards!
· 2 for 1? Let’s go! Get access to lifestyle offers with over 500 discounts available to redeem instantly right from the app.
· Earn wherever you spend: automatically earn CBD Rewards points with your spends.
· Convert your CBD Rewards points to cashback, air miles, vouchers, flights & hotels bookings and more!


DID YOU KNOW? You can also…

· Login with your fingerprint or FaceID (for iPhone X and 11)
· Apply for any CBD products including Islamic banking
· Lock / unlock your cards in real-time
· Update your profile details such as Emirates ID
· Get help with our virtual assistant Aysha
· Use UAE pass to recover your login details
· Top up existing loans, get salary advance (for eligible customers)

There’s a lot more to come! Expect to see more exciting and innovative new features often. Send us your suggestions and feedback at one.app@cbd.ae

title: CBD

creator: Commercial Bank of Dubai
descriptionHtml:
Manage and access your finances wherever you are with the best digital bank in the UAE. Access 100+ banking products and services with a trusted digital bank.

Open a digital account instantly, get a credit card or apply for a quick loan in minutes using only your emirates ID. Signup from anywhere with just your EID and access all the products that give you the financial freedom you desire.

Pay and transfer in seconds.
Make quick payments and transfers to your friends and family anywhere in the world, including faster money transfers to India, Pakistan, Philippines, and Bangladesh. CBD also support wallet top-ups to Easypaisa, Bkash, Jazz Cash and Coins.

Manage your products and accounts in one place.
Hassle-free activation for your savings account, current account, credit cards, or personal loans instantly with just a tap.

Control your card.

title: CBD - Instant digital banking

creator: Commercial Bank of Dubai
descriptionHtml:
Manage your banking wherever you are with the No. 1 Bank in the UAE. Sign up in minutes with just your Emirates ID and get a Current Account, Credit Card, Quick Loan, Mortgage Pre-Approval and more in the App.

THE HIGHEST-RATED BANKING APP IN THE UAE
· Award-winning Current Account
· Instantly activated Credit Cards
· Instant loan approvals
· Fast Money Transfers worldwide, including instant transfers to Bangladesh, India, Pakistan and the Philippines
· Two free Money Transfers every month
· Automated Bill Payments
· Instantly activated Foreign Currency and Savings Accounts
· Buy and sell gold 24-7 with the Gold Current Account
· Take full contol of your spending in real-time, set limits and manage banking services in the App
· Over 1,000 offers and discounts in the App

BANK WITH CONFIDENCE
Commercial Bank of Dubai (CBD) is a leading banking and financial services institution in the UAE with over 50 years of experience. In 2022, CBD was recognised as the No. 1 Bank in the UAE by Forbes.

AWARDS
· No. 1 Bank in the UAE - Forbes World’s Best Banks 2022 Report
· Best Technological Innovation in Financial Services – Seamless Awards 2022
· Outstanding Supply Chain Finance Solution – Middle East & Africa Innovation Awards 2022
· Best Commercial Bank & Best Digital Transformation Implementation – MEA Finance Awards 2021
· Finfluencer of the Year and Excellence in Innovation – Finnovex Awards 2021
· Employee Engagement Champion – LinkedIn Talent Awards MENA 2021
descriptionShort: The No. 1 bank in the UAE. Sign up in minutes with your Emirates ID.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using the CBD App. We update the app regularly to make your daily banking experience better.
- Apply for the all-new CBD Yes Rewards Credit Card in the App and save up to 15% on fuel and more.
- Instantly open a Silver Current Account to buy and sell silver 24-7.
- See new products and offers in the Stories section.

title:
CBD - Instant digital banking
8.4.1

creator: Commercial Bank of Dubai
descriptionHtml:
Wherever you happen to be, our new mobile banking App is easy, fast, and secure.
And now managing your money is easier than ever before.

Commercial Bank of Dubai (CBD) is a leading banking and financial services institution in the UAE, backing ambitions since 1969.
With over 55 years in the UAE and award-winning banking services, you can rest assured that all your banking needs are taken care of by a trusted financial partner.

120+ services
Experience a feature-rich design with 120+ services for your everyday banking, most of which are processed instantly.

Instant banking in minutes
Sign up in minutes with just your Emirates ID and get a Current Account, Credit Card, Quick Loan, Home Loan Pre-Approval and more in the UAE’s highest rated Mobile Banking App.

Transfers & payments in seconds
Make instant transfers to Bangladesh, India, Pakistan and the Philippines as well as instant local transfers all with just a few taps. You can also make over 20 utility payments include Du, Etisalat, Dewa and so much more.

1,000+ lifestyle offers
Enjoy over a thousand offers and discounts across dining, entertainment, lifestyle and so much more with the CBD App using your CBD Credit or Debit Card.
descriptionShort: The No. 1 bank in the UAE. Sign up in minutes with your Emirates ID.
